statements: SELECT * FROM ArtConservation;
SELECT id, project_name FROM ArtConservation;
SELECT * FROM ArtConservation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, restoration_process FROM ArtConservation WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, historical_context FROM ArtConservation WHERE restoration_process LIKE '%cleaning%';
SELECT project_name, restoration_process FROM ArtConservation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ArtConservation WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, historical_context FROM ArtConservation WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT project_name, restoration_process, conservation_notes FROM ArtConservation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArtConservation WHERE historical_context IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM art_restoration_projects;
SELECT project_name, restoration_notes FROM art_restoration_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, restoration_notes, historical_context FROM art_restoration_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, historical_context FROM art_restoration_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM restoration_steps ORDER BY step_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, restoration_notes, historical_context FROM art_restoration_projects;
SELECT project_name, historical_context, restoration_notes FROM art_restoration_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS num_steps FROM art_restoration_projects JOIN restoration_steps ON art_restoration_projects.project_id = restoration_steps.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING num_steps > 5;

SELECT project_name, step_description, step_date FROM art_restoration_projects JOIN restoration_steps ON art_restoration_projects.project_id = restoration_steps.project_id WHERE step_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY step_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, restoration_notes, historical_context FROM art_restoration_projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM restoration_processes;
SELECT process_id, project_id, process_description FROM restoration_processes WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT process_id, process_description FROM restoration_processes ORDER BY process_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, count(*) AS num_processes FROM restoration_processes GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, process_id FROM restoration_processes WHERE process_description LIKE '%conservation%' ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM restoration_processes WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY process_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT process_id, project_id, process_description FROM restoration_processes WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY process_id ASC
SELECT * FROM conservation_notes WHERE project_id = 3 AND note_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT project_id, event_description FROM historical_context WHERE project_id = 4 AND event_date > '2010-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS note_count FROM conservation_notes GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM restoration_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM restoration_notes WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT note_content, note_date FROM restoration_notes WHERE note_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM restoration_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM restoration_projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_id, end_date FROM restoration_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, process_name, process_description FROM restoration_projects JOIN conservation_processes ON restoration_projects.project_id = conservation_processes.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM Projects;
SELECT process_id, process_description, process_date FROM RestorationProcesses ORDER BY process_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, art_description FROM ArtPieces WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT context_id, context_description FROM HistoricalContext WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM RestorationProcesses WHERE process_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, process_description FROM RestorationProcesses WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY process_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%Art%';
SELECT * FROM ConservationNotes WHERE note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT art_id, artist_name, art_description FROM ArtPieces WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
